fields_of_interest: Energy, Business and Industry, Environment, Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, Regional Policy, Research and innovation, Digital economy and society, Climate Action
eu_initiatives:
Horizon 2020:  Member of the national coordination group, with the task to advise the Finnish Government EU Affairs Department on sector-specific preparation of European Council meetings and on actions relating to institutional questions and general development of the EU. 
 
Structural Funds / RIS3: Member of the Coordination Committee (MYR) within Helsinki-Uusimaa Regional Council, with the task to develop and implement the region’s Smart Specialisation Strategy  
 
RDI policies on a broad basis: Member of EARTO European Association of Research and Technology Organisations
organisation_name: VTT Technical Research Centre of Finland Ltd (VTT)
section: IV - Think tanks, research and academic institutions
belgium_office_address: EARTO - European Association of Research and Technology Organisations Rue Joseph II, 36-38
commission_expert_groups_and_other_simil: Horizon 2020 Advisory Group for Societal Challenge 5 'Climate Action, Environment, Resource Efficiency and Raw Materials'#E02924#http://ec.europa.eu/transparency/regexpert/index.cfm?do=groupDetail.groupDetail&groupID=2924#Member#C#Commission operational expert group of the European Innovation Partnership on Raw Materials #E03392#http://ec.europa.eu/transparency/regexpert/index.cfm?do=groupDetail.groupDetail&groupID=3392#Member#C#Support to Circular Economy Financing Expert Group#E03517#http://ec.europa.eu/transparency/regexpert/index.cfm?do=groupDetail.groupDetail&groupID=3517#Member#C#Strategic Forum for Important Projects of Common European Interest (IPCEI)#E03583#http://ec.europa.eu/transparency/regexpert/index.cfm?do=groupDetail.groupDetail&groupID=3583#Member#C#Sherps's group
relevant_communication:
H2020:  between 2014-2017 VTT was involved in 269 H2020 (and other European) projects 
 
European Innovation Partnerships (EIP): Raw Materials, Smart Cities and Communities, Water 
 
Institutional Public Private Partnership/ Joint Technology Initiatives (JTI) / Joint Undertaking (JU): ECSEL, BBI, FCH 
 
Contractual Public Private Partnership (cPPP): EeB, SPIRE, FoF, Photonics, Robotics, Big Data, 5G, CyberSecurity 
 
EIT (European Institute for Innovation & Technology): Digital, Raw Materials, Food 
 
European Technology Platforms (ETP): several ETPs 
 
EERA, European Energy Research Alliance 
EARTO Security Working Group 
EMIRI, Energy Materials Industrial Research Initiative 
NUGENIA, NUclear GENeration II & III Association 
ETSON, European Technical Safety Organisations Network 
JIIP, Joint Institute of Innovation Policy
goals__remit: As a fully state-owned, non-profit organisation with a specific service mandate, VTT Technical Research Centre of Finland Ltd is part of Finland's innovation system and operates under the mandate of the Ministry of Economc Affairs and Employment and receives budget funding from the state. As an impartial non-profit Research and Technology Organisation (RTO) and with the national mandate and mission to support economic competitiveness, societal development and innovation, VTT carries out research and innovation activities for the needs of industry and knowledge-based society.
